Watching this incredible event on Italian TV now in Viterbo, just 15km from here. Every September 3, 100 people (called ""facchini"") carry the ""Macchina di Santa Rosa"" through town. The monument is 5,000 kg, over 33m tall, and they carry it over 1 km, to honor the town's patron saint, Santa Rosa.
